name: sambamba_coverage_uniformity_v1.2
title: sambamba_coverage_uniformity_v1.2
summary: For x samples this app uses the coverage bed files calculated by Sambamba to visualise the variability in coverage at each genomic region. It produces a separate rport for each panel Sambamba was run with.  Results are available as an interactive plot, simplified pdf plot, and csv table.

inputSpec.name: selected_project
inputSpec.label: Name of project holding Sambamba coverage bedfiles

inputSpec.name: plot_figures
inputSpec.label: Plot figures
inputSpec.help: Should figures be produced, or will the csv output suffice?

inputSpec.name: simple_plot_only
inputSpec.label: Plot simple figures only
inputSpec.help: Plot only the simplified static figure (May speed up drawing plots for large data sets)

inputSpec.name: No jitter on barplots
inputSpec.label: No jitter on barplots
inputSpec.help: Don't plot data points on barplots (May speed up drawing plots for large data sets)

outputSpec.name: coverage_summary_out
outputSpec.label: Uniformity of coverage summary reports
outputSpec.help: Uniformity of coverage Summary reports, inteactive html plot, static pdf plot, and csv table
